Begin Mini-Page 600812
CONTACT US
Find out how Heritage Bay
can be your new Style of Living!
Clubhouse Address
10154 Heritage Bay Boulevard
Naples, Florida 34120
Clubhouse Contacts
Call us at
(239) 353-7056
Email us at
[email protected]
Fax: (239) 384-6170
End Mini-Page 600812
Directions
Begin Mini-Page 601087
Heritage Bay is located on Immokalee Road (exit 111 off of Interstate 75), six miles east of Interstate 75 and 1.3 miles east of 951 (Collier Blvd) which intersects Immokalee Road from the south. We are located between the Quarry Golf Course and Bonita Bay East on the north side of Immokalee Road.
Heritage Bay is located just minutes away from Naples' pristine beaches and several upscale and diverse shopping and dining areas, including Mercato, Waterside Shops, and 5th Avenue in the heart of downtown Naples.
End Mini-Page 601087
Gate Access & Parking
Begin Mini-Page 601088
Be prepared to provide your driver's license to the gate attendant upon your arrival at Heritage Bay. Pre-authorization by your host will insure your quick entry to the community and Club. You will find plenty of parking in front of the Clubhouse, the bag drop off area, and the Wellness Center and court area. Simply follow the signs to the Clubhouse or Bag Drop.
End Mini-Page 601088

Begin Mini-Page 601914

Begin Mini-Page 601915
Membership
When you purchase your home in Heritage Bay, you are automatically a member of Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club.
There are no equity or deposits required.  The value of the home includes the value of your country club membership.  This is one of the benefits of a bundled community!
Heritage Bay is rich in amenities! You not only have access to a beautifully maintained 27-hole golf course, but also a state of the art aqua driving range, a spacious recently refurbished clubhouse, a variety of restaurants, tennis and pickle ball, bocce ball, a resort-style pool and 5 additional satellite pools, a 24-hour manned gatehouse, a social calendar packed with fun and unique events and activities, a state of the art workout facility and much more!
Because all homeowners are also members of the Club, there is an innate sense of fellowship. Here, homeowners can be involved in the community and the Club's amenities as much or as little as they desire.
View Our Community Map
2025 Schedule of User Fees
Heritage Bay was featured on Golf America!
WOW! The $10 million project expanding the Club's casual outdoor dining is complete!
Check out the drone flight video of the Grille Room and The Cabana!
Click on the play button below to link to the tv program.
Click the play button below to connect to the video via Heritage Bay's YouTube channel!
End Mini-Page 601915
Closing Information - Estoppel Requests & Member Questionnaire
Begin Mini-Page 601929
How to Request an Estoppel for Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club, Inc.
Please send estoppel requests to Stephanie McIntosh at
[email protected]
.
The Estoppel Fee is $220 ($75 for an update) and can be collected at closing.
Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club does not have an application process, but new owners can complete a
Member Questionnaire
to expedite the creation of their membership. Memberships are processed when Administration receives the closing documents, closing fees and Member Questionnaire. Allow 1-2 business days from the time of receipt to complete the creation of a membership, at which time the new member will receive an email with their membership details.
End Mini-Page 601929

End Mini-Page 601932
Transferring Membership to an Approved Tenant
Begin Mini-Page 601930
Membership Transfer Information
Members of Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club have the ability to transfer their use of Heritage Bay's amenities to their approved tenants.
The Club Membership Transfer must be for a minimum of thirty (30) days.
Approval is contingent upon separate lease approval from the appropriate Neighborhood Association (see list below).
There is an administrative Transfer Fee of $500 (payable to the Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club).
The Club requires at least thirty (30) days’ notice to process Membership Transfers.
Use these documents for additional information on, and applying for, a Transfer of Club Membership:
Transfer of Club Membership Application
Updated July 29, 2024
Transfer of Club Membership Procedures
Updated July 29, 2024
Contact Kelly Jewart at
kellyj
@golfheritagebay.com
for more information!
Neighborhood Association Management Companies:
Coach
    Homes; Terraces II, III, V, VI, VIII & IX; Verandas I, II, III, VI,
    VII & VIII - Cambridge Management – (239) 249-7000
Single Family Homes; Verandas IV & V – Sandcastle Management (239) 596-7200
Terrace
    I - Ability Management (239) 591-4200
Terrace
    IV - Precedent Management – (727) 573-9300
Terrace
    VII - Pegasus Property Management - (239) 454-8568
End Mini-Page 601930
Forms for Realtors
Begin Mini-Page 601967
Would you like your open house to be included on the list provided, as a courtesy, at Heritage Bay's entrance gate?
Just
click here to print a copy of the Heritage Bay Open House List Inclusion Request
or
click here to fill out the Heritage Bay Open House List Inclusion Request electronically
and email it to
[email protected]
before 1:00 the Friday before your open house.
Need an open house sign?
You can purchase an approved Heritage Bay open house sign in our Pro Shop.  Call or email Brenda Simms for details at 239-353-7056 x 121 or
[email protected]
.
For Sale or Rent Sign Specifications, Rules and Regulations
Rules for Holding an Open House in Heritage Bay
-
click here
to print a copy
Heritage Bay Open
House Procedures
Updated April 2021
1.  Open
Houses may be held on Saturdays and Sundays between 12:00 and 5:00 p.m.
2.  A
list of registered Open Houses, with the address and realtor’s name and a
community map, will be given out at the entrance gate on Saturdays and Sundays.  To register your Open House for inclusion on the list,
submit the
Open
House List Inclusion Request Form
to
adm
in@
golfheritagebay.com
no later than 1:00 the Friday before your Open House.
3.  During
approved Open House hours, only Heritage Bay Open House signage is permitted.
These signs may be purchased in the Golf Pro Shop daily between 8:00 a.m. and
5:00 p.m.  Contact the Pro Shop at
239-353-7056 or
[email protected]
for details.
4.  Signs
may be erected 30 minutes prior to the Open House start time and must be taken
down no later than 30 minutes afterwards.
5.  You
may place two Open House signs as specified in bullet points 6 and 7.  No signs may be placed on the street side of
any sidewalk.
6.  For
Single Family Homes and Coach Homes one sign may be displayed at the beginning
of the residence’s street and the other in the front yard.
7.  For
Verandas and Terraces one sign may be displayed at the entrance drive closest to
the residence and the other at the walkway closest to the entrance of the residence.
8.  No
other signage may be used anywhere in
the community.
9.  All
unapproved signage will be removed by Access Control. Open House privileges may
be suspended for violation of any of the Open House or Residential Resale
rules.
End Mini-Page 601967

Begin Mini-Page 600782
Event Inquiry
Contact Brooke Miller, Events & Activities Director |
[email protected]
| 259-384-6166
At Heritage Bay we specialize in creating special events and banquets that will wow you. Our professional team takes great pride in making you and your guests feel special, yet very much at home.
Whether you’re considering hosting baby showers, baptisms, anniversaries, graduations, wedding showers, golf tournaments, charity events,  school reunions, holiday parties, engagement announcement parties, birthday’s, or other special events, Heritage Bay will make your event spectacular.
Heritage Bay offers a variety of rooms, from private dining areas that can accommodate 30 - 60 to our Ball Room that seats up to 240 of your special guests.  We can also arrange private dinner parties for groups as small as 10.
For more information on Heritage Bay’s Special Event & Banquet facilities and services please see our links below or feel free to call us!
Heritage Bay Banquets & Catering Guide
End Mini-Page 600782
